response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I suggest we discuss a fair price that reflects its worth to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $180. This allows us to both appreciate the true value of the product while ensuring a fair transaction for me. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 180}
